00011 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 //  Display a map with a cursor on it, which moves with the camera
00013 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 
00015 void CameraMap::DisplayMap(const int & screenWidth, const int & screenHeight,
00016                                            const GLdouble &xPos, const GLdouble & zPos, const GLuint & tempImage)
00017 {
00018         GLdouble tempX = xPos/163.0 - 2096/163;
00019         GLdouble tempZ = zPos/164.0 - 4688/164;
00020         glPushMatrix();
00021         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00022         glPushMatrix();
00023         glLoadIdentity();
00024         gluOrtho2D(0, screenWidth, 0, screenHeight);
00025         glScalef(1, -1, 1);
00026         
00027         // mover the origin from the bottom left corner
00028         // to the upper left corner
00029         glTranslatef(0, -screenHeight, 0);
00030         
00031         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00032         glLoadIdentity();
00033 
00034         // display the cursor of the camera position
00035         glBegin(GL_QUADS);              
00036                 glVertex3f(219.0 - tempX - 2.0, 256.0 - tempZ - 2.0, 0.0);
00037                 glVertex3f(219.0 - tempX + 2.0, 256.0 - tempZ - 2.0,  0.0);
00038                 glVertex3f(219.0 - tempX + 2.0, 256.0 - tempZ + 2.0,  0.0);
00039                 glVertex3f(219.0 - tempX - 2.0, 256.0 - tempZ + 2.0, 0.0);
00040         glEnd();
00041         
00042         // display map
00043         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage);
00044         glCallList(448);
00045 
00046         // Reset Perspective Projection
00047         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00048         glPopMatrix();
00049         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00050         glPopMatrix();
00051 }
00052 
00053 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 //  Displays a welcome or exit screen
00055 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 void CameraMap::DisplayWelcomeScreen (const int & screenWidth, const int & screenHeight, 
00057                                                                           const int & tempExit, const GLuint & tempImage)
00058 {
00059         glPushMatrix();
00060         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00061         glPushMatrix();
00062         glLoadIdentity();
00063         gluOrtho2D(0, screenWidth, 0, screenHeight);
00064         glScalef(1, -1, 1);
00065         
00066         // move to centre of screen
00067         glTranslatef(screenWidth/2 -256.0, -screenHeight/2 -256.0, 0);
00068         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00069         glLoadIdentity();       
00070         // display exit screen or welcome screen
00071         if (tempExit == 1)
00072         {
00073                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage);
00074         }
00075         else
00076         {
00077                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage);
00078         }
00079         // display image
00080         glCallList(449);
00081         // Reset Perspective Projection
00082         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00083         glPopMatrix();
00084         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00085         glPopMatrix();
00086 }
00087 
00088 void CameraMap::DisplayNoExit (const int & screenWidth, const int & screenHeight, 
00089                                                            const GLuint & tempImage)
00090 {
00091         glPushMatrix();
00092         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00093         glPushMatrix();
00094         glLoadIdentity();
00095         gluOrtho2D(0, screenWidth, 0, screenHeight);
00096         glScalef(1, -1, 1);
00097         
00098         // move to centre of screen
00099         glTranslatef(screenWidth/2 -128.0, -screenHeight/2 -32.0, 0);
00100         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00101         glLoadIdentity();       
00102         // display sign
00103         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage);
00104         // display image
00105         glCallList(454);
00106         // Reset Perspective Projection
00107         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00108         glPopMatrix();
00109         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00110         glPopMatrix();
00111 }
